controller

Class AdminPublisherController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminController<Publisher>
      • controller.AdminPublisherController

  • public class AdminPublisherController
extends AdminController<Publisher>
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete publisher data.
    Author:
    Dakota
